entry.def: If you say that someone is deathly pale or deathly still, you are emphasizing that they are very pale or still, like a dead person.

example.tran: 贝尔纳黛特脸色变得死一般地惨白。
她像死了一样一动不动地躺在那里。

entry.def: If you say that someone is deathly afraid, you are emphasizing that they are very afraid. You can also say that someone or something is deathly silent, dull, boring, cold, or tired.

example.ex: He is deathly afraid of black crows...
I took a deathly dull job.
example.tran: 我接受了一份极其枯燥的工作。

entry.def: If you say that there is a deathly silence or a deathly hush, you are emphasizing that it is very quiet.

example.ex: A deathly silence hung over the square.

means.word_mean: 1. having the physical appearance of death;
2. causing or capable of causing death;

auth_sentence.content: I'm always deathly afraid some jackass will see the light turn green, and barrel into me before I'm safely on the sidewalk.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm always deathly afraid some jackass will see the light turn green, and barrel into me before I'm safely on the sidewalk.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm always deathly afraid some jackass will see the light turn green, and barrel into me before I'm safely on the sidewalk.

auth_sentence.content: "When I graduated from college, I was a terrible public speaker and deathly afraid of the experience," he says.
auth_sentence.res_content: "When I graduated from college, I was a terrible public speaker and deathly afraid of the experience," he says.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "When I graduated from college, I was a terrible public speaker and deathly afraid of the experience," he says.

auth_sentence.content: Even when he was deathly ill, Kapun continued to conduct Mass, sacrifice, and administer aid to his fellow soldiers.
auth_sentence.res_content: Even when he was deathly ill, Kapun continued to conduct Mass, sacrifice, and administer aid to his fellow soldiers.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Even when he was deathly ill, Kapun continued to conduct Mass, sacrifice, and administer aid to his fellow soldiers.

means.word_mean: 死一般的/地;让人想到死亡

sentences.en: The deserted village was filled with a deathly silence.
sentences.cn: 这个荒废的村庄死一般的寂静。
